result.execSummary:
The defendant Jill M Schweller was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take >$500 - $5000), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: May be transferred to Racine County.

miscConds.notes: Restitution to be paid to Boston Store as a Condition of Probation.

Court Costs and DNA to be paid as a Condition of Probation.

If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.

Follow through with any treatment/counseling recommended by the Agent.
No contact with Boston Store.
Provide DNA sample if not already done.
Defendant to provide DNA sample immediately if in custody or within 3 business days at the Waukesha Sheriff's dept.

timeConds.notes: Condition Time - nonworking hours - STAYED. To be used at the Agent's discretion. Huber/straight time to be used at Agent's discretion as well.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jill M Schweller

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Notice of Case Status Change - Defendant Deceased

Defendant Jill M Schweller in court with attorney J Anthony Rosario.  Abbey Nickolie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Parties proceed to sentencing on Ct. 1.


Court orders the following: 
Ct. 1:
- 6 months jail straight time STAYED for 1 year Probation - maybe transferred to Racine County
- Court Costs of $268.00 to be paid as a Condition of Probation 
- Restitution of $99.00 to be paid to Boston Store to be paid as a Condition of Probation.
- DNA SURCHARGE of $250.00 to be paid as a Condition of Probation or to be converted to a civil judgment for non payment of surcharge.
- Conditions of  Probation:   Follow thru with any treatment/counseling recommended by Agent. No contact with any Boston Store.   DNA Sample if not yet provided.
- Defendant to provide DNA sample,  immediately if in custody or within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
 - 10 days jail Condition Time (nonworking hours) STAYED to be used at the Agents discretion. Huber/Straight Time to be used at the Agent's Discretion.
